productDescription: The food of the Greek gods. One bite restores full health and grants temporary immortality. Warning: May cause arrogance and a desire to smite mortals. Consuming too much may result in godhood.
Keeps the Norse gods eternally young. Grants +50 Vitality and halts the aging process. A favorite of Loki, though usually stolen rather than bought. Side effects include being chased by giants.
Blessed by Dionysus himself. Increases Charisma by +20 and grants the 'Party Animal' buff. Perfect for social encounters, though it may decrease Dexterity and Wisdom temporarily.
Resin harvested from the World Tree. Connects you to the nine realms, granting 'Cosmic Awareness' and +100 Mana. Taste is described as earthy with a hint of eternal knowledge.
Six seeds bound Persephone to Hades; one whole fruit grants 'Shadow Walk' and resistance to necrotic damage. Consuming this item binds you to the server for 6 months of the year.
Charged with the lightning of Thor. Grants 'Stormstrike' ability on your next attack and +40 Strength. Warning: Extremely spicy. Only those worthy can digest it without heartburn.
